snippet: A Japan Airlines-operated Boeing 787 Dreamliner made an emergency landing at Honolulu Airport after oil pressure in its right engine dropped, the Japanese carrier said.
abstract: Japan Airlines-operated Boeing 787 Dreamliner makes emergency landing at Honolulu Airport after oil pressure in its right engine drops; incident is latest mechanical problem for 787; another Dreamliner emitted smoke after its battery melted at Boston’s Logan Airport in January 2013.
lead_paragraph: A Japan Airlines-operated Boeing 787 Dreamliner made an emergency landing at Honolulu Airport after oil pressure in its right engine dropped, the Japanese carrier said.
